MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH5 postcode area of Hawarden, affecting properties in Manor Lane, Clwyd Close and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 07.58am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10.00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08.58am on 13 April 2021.
